column4: Is there any way that I can automatically log in to the wireless network on startup?
: Just connect it once and next time you are logged automatically.

pink_panther, it's not doing that for me.  I have to manually choose the network name from the list.  It remembers the password, but I have to click on it each boot (fresh install of 10.04 this weekend)
: You have connected more than one so get rid of the others.
